entry.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18870)
entry.content:
Twitter @Sanctuary4AllCO was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=Sanctuary4AllCO&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere

entry.title: we had a great day today. We had a new town and we celebrated...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

we had a great day today. We had a new town and we celebrated the birthday of one of our allies Helen, thank you for always supporting us,

entry.title: New location
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

New location

Were moving! コ Were so grateful to have had the space at the First Unitarian Society of Denver for the last year. This week, were moving up the street to sel...l the same delicious food at @metrocaring. Were so thankful for the space and excited to be working with them. Order gorditas from Lupe at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co and come check out the new location!

See More

entry.title: Today we are honoring the life of Elijah McClain. Say his name.
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Today we are honoring the life of Elijah McClain.
Say his name.

entry.title: Today we were walking the streets handing out our flyers for our...
entry.content: Sanctuary4All ColoradoToday we were walking the streets handing out our flyers for our meals. We hope to have the support of each of you as always. each impacted family continues in the fight. see you on Saturday at our inauguration and at our new addressToday we were walking the streets handing out our flyers for our meals. We hope to have the support of each of you as always. each impacted family continues in the fight. see you on Saturday at our inauguration and at our new address

Were moving! コ Were so grateful to have had the space at the First Unitarian Society of Denver for the last year. This week, were moving up the street to sel...l the same delicious food at @metrocaring. Were so thankful for the space and excited to be working with them. Order gorditas from Lupe at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co and come check out the new location!

entry.title: Were moving! コ Were so grateful to have had the space...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is at Metro Caring. 路 Denver

Were moving! コ Were so grateful to have had the space at the First Unitarian Society of Denver for the last year. This week, were moving up the street to sell the same delicious food at @metrocaring. Were so thankful for the space and excited to be working with them. Order gorditas from Lupe at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co and come check out the new location!

Lupe is selling gorditas this weekend to raise money for a necessary surgery to treat a hernia. Without insurance, shes been ineligible to even schedule the su...rgery until it got worse, and she still has to raise the money to pay for it and take time off work afterward. Buying gorditas, and sharing the sale with family and friends, is one way you can help. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: Lupe is selling gorditas this weekend to raise money for a...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Lupe is selling gorditas this weekend to raise money for a necessary surgery to treat a hernia. Without insurance, shes been ineligible to even schedule the surgery until it got worse, and she still has to raise the money to pay for it and take time off work afterward. Buying gorditas, and sharing the sale with family and friends, is one way you can help. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: Memories
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado shared a memory.

Memories

3 Years AgoSee Your Memorieschevron-rightJeanette Vizguerra is with Luz Garcia and Elvira Arellano in Chicago, Illinois.

Gracias a cada persona que me hicieron sentir increible cin sus atenciones en Chicago dias de conocer gente nueva creando conecciones y lazos de apoyo mutuo gra...cias Luz Garcia pir la invitacion y cada dia hasta el mas sabio aprende cosas nuevas gracias por poner en mi vida mujeres guerreras Cecilia Garcia. Elvira Arellano. Ana Burciaga. Emma lozano. Pastora Jacobita. Pastor Gustavo y pastora Maria medina. Pastora Lucrecia Mercado. Taina Rodriguez Constituent Advocate and Congresista Jan Schakowsky al Cinsul de Mex en Chicago fueron dias productivos donde pude ver a mis primos Eva. Y Juanma Ramirez hasta la proxima.

See More+10

entry.title: Protest in solidarity with Afghanistan! Please show up if you...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Protest in solidarity with Afghanistan! Please show up if you can.

Alt image: Emergency Protest in black, bolded letters, followed by a Black fist with black, red, and green explosion behind it. The wrist has the Afghanistan flag wrapped around it. Near the bottom are black, red, and green handprints layered on top of each other.

Information on protest as followed:...
August 19, 2021
Gather at 6 P.M. for a rally followed by a march.

Colorado State Capitol
200 E Colfax Ave. Denver, CO 80203

We march on Afghanistan's national day of independence demanding an end to proxy wars, forced displacements, and the recent terrors unleashed upon Afghanistan.

Mask and carpooling encouraged.
Parking available along Lincoln Ave and Sherman St.

Contact: Zmhashem0209@gmail.com

See More

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All ColoradoThank you for all the support you have given us with the solidarity meals program during this...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado

Thank you for all the support you have given us with the solidarity meals program during this year and 3 months, we inform you that we are in the process of cha...nging direction and that is why this week we will not have food because we are planning the inauguration of the new place . On August 21, follow us to find out about the event, and continue supporting the families. Thanks a lot

entry.title: Thank you for all the support you have given us with the...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Thank you for all the support you have given us with the solidarity meals program during this year and 3 months, we inform you that we are in the process of changing direction and that is why this week we will not have food because we are planning the inauguration of the new place . On August 21, follow us to find out about the event, and continue supporting the families. Thanks a lot
